name: Global Game Jam 2020 - Rhee & Pehr
description:
'Ree & Per' was the result of our participation in the 2020 Global Game Jam with topic 'Repair'. It is a 2D platformer, where the protagonist, a little girl with an engineering knack, re-assembles her robot to run-off together into new adventures.

Global Game Jame page link:
https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/rhee-pehr-7

'Ree & Per' was the proud work of the following team:
Character & Environment Artists: Hamed Talebany & Rezvan Mousavi
Programming: Olga Chatzifoti 
Audio: Lucius Ray

See you next year!
